name: Alien Armor
raw:
</center><blue>To show the Recipe for an Alien Armor piece do:</blue>
<cyan><symbol>aiarmor 'type'</cyan>

<blue>If you want to specify the QL do:</blue>
<cyan><symbol>aiarmor 'type' 'ql of the armor'</cyan>


<blue>Allowed Types:</blue>
cc - Combined Commando's
cm - Combined Mercenary's
co - Combined Officer's
cp - Combined Paramedic's
cs - Combined Scout's
ss - Combined Sharpshooter's
strong - Strong Armor
supple - Supple Armor
enduring - Enduring Armor
observant - Observant Armor
arithmetic - Arithmetic Armor
spiritual - Spiritual Armor

Example: #L "!aiarmor cc 150" "/tell <myname> aiarmor cc 150"
